amendment.description: To authorize representatives of veterans service organizations to appear at preseparation counseling provided by the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3171 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3171 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S6055; text: CR S6055) To authorize representatives of veterans service organizations to appear at preseparation counseling provided by the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3171 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3171 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
